headline: The Square
description: A recursive meditation on the SATOR square as a completed structure that transfers authorship to the reader. A ritual text that names creation, mystery, and responsibility through repetition, humor, and direct address.

motifMap.meaning: Closed structure that endlessly reassigns meaning
Wisdom delivered through paradox, humor, and unsettlement
Recursion, repetition, and return without resolution

associatedMedia.description: Minimalist text-based presentation of the SATOR Square meditation
